snippet: Philipp Humm talks about whether T-Mobile will continue to seek being acquired, whether there is a spectrum crisis and how the carrier is positioning itself for the next generation of wireless technology.
abstract: Philipp Humm talks about whether T-Mobile will continue to seek being acquired, whether there is a spectrum crisis and how the carrier is positioning itself for the next generation of wireless technology.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - For several months in 2011, the wireless carriers T-Mobile USA and AT&T were pursuing a merger to unify their networks and expand their businesses. The deal ultimately collapsed after facing resistance from governmental agencies, which raised antitrust concerns.

headline.main: Q.&A.: T-Mobile's Chief on What's Next After Failed AT&T Merger
